name: Haxagon
description:
Draw loops on the hex grid with your mouse to shift all the marbles on the path by 1. Blobs of 4 or more marbles of the same color are removed. Draw a hexagon with all the corners the same color to clear all of that color.

Beat my high score of 98400 (in Classic mode)!

My goal for this game was to get the player in a flow state. I may or may not have succeeded.

Todo: instructions screen, custom game settings, turn off the music, fix the weird bug where the next marble spawnpoint is in midair, better feedback for score multipliers.
